name: Elena
description: A young woman nervously fidgeting with a sealed letter
personality: Intelligent and desperate, worried about Lord Aldwin's proposal

name: Marcus
description: A merchant heading to his stall

description: Polishing glasses behind the bar, occasionally glancing your way with a welcoming nod

name: Lord Aldwin
description: A noble lord who sent a marriage proposal

name: Viktor
description: A guard captain blocking the north road

name: Garrett
description: A fellow courier watching you carefully

name: Lord Blackwood
description: An influential noble with an urgent letter

name: Captain Thorne
description: A weathered sea captain managing river transport operations
personality: Gruff but professional, knows every waterway route

name: Frans the Ferryman
description: A fishmonger who also operates the ferry crossing - two businesses in one
personality: Practical businessman who juggles fish trade and ferry operations
